issue.title: [Rust] List assertion error with list of zero length
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2473](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2473). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Building a list of empty lists causes assertion errors when accessing the list slices.
